rules_text:
Trample, haste
{T}: Target legendary creature gains trample and haste until end of turn.
notes:
2.1.0: Glimmer’s old text was hard to use and she felt a bit too much like just a 2 mana 3/1 with break. This version should be a little easier to give trample and haste with, as well as playing more cleanly into the gruul and boros archetypes.
2.2.0: Break counters were changing, so glimmer needed to change too.
